price: 19. Shaydaan baa duufsaday oo hilmaan- siiyey xusidda Ilaahay. Kuwaasi waa xisbiga Shaydaanka. Ogaada hubaal waa xisbiga shaydaanka kuwa khasaaray.
arabic: ٱسۡتَحۡوَذَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ ذِكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ حِزۡبُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: is'taḥwadha ʿalayhimu al-shayṭānu fa-ansāhum dhik'ra al-lahi ulāika ḥiz'bu al-shayṭāni alā inna ḥiz'ba al-shayṭāni humu al-khāsirūna
